nodes.text: The Farfax system was a star system located in the galaxy. Whilst they were on Weigh Station Karambola, L3-37 informed Lando Calrissian that it was imperative that they depart the station immediately and head to the Farfax system before stating that she wouldn't have asked if it wasn't an urgent matter of life or death. They left on the Millennium Falcon, arriving in the midst of the Mesulan Remnants Belt.
